Sentencas: This study is focused on a hybrid fuel cell/gas turbine (FC/GT) system with an atmospheric pressure solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Control design of an atmospheric solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine hybrid system: Variable versus fixed speed gas turbine operation

Sentencas: The impact of the gas turbine rotational speed on dynamic performance and controllability of a hybrid system is investigated.
Titulo: Control design of an atmospheric solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine hybrid system: Variable versus fixed speed gas turbine operation

Sentencas: The transient response of the FC/GT system to perturbations in the power demand has been investigated.
Titulo: Control design of an atmospheric solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine hybrid system: Variable versus fixed speed gas turbine operation

Sentencas: Two operational strategies of gas turbines are compared: (1) fixed speed operation, and (2) variable speed operation.
Titulo: Control design of an atmospheric solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine hybrid system: Variable versus fixed speed gas turbine operation

Sentencas: For both operation strategies, a wide range of power production is numerically simulated.
Titulo: Control design of an atmospheric solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine hybrid system: Variable versus fixed speed gas turbine operation

Sentencas: The results show that variable speed operation is superior for the FC/GT hybrid configuration studied.
Titulo: Control design of an atmospheric solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine hybrid system: Variable versus fixed speed gas turbine operation

Sentencas: Variable speed operation allows a 50% turn down in power with no additional balance of plant equipment required.
Titulo: Control design of an atmospheric solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine hybrid system: Variable versus fixed speed gas turbine operation

Sentencas: The system efficiency is maintained above 66% for variable speed operation compared to 53% for fixed speed operation with auxiliary combustion.
Titulo: Control design of an atmospheric solid oxide fuel cell/gas turbine hybrid system: Variable versus fixed speed gas turbine operation
